description:
math/rand: decrease test duration in short mode
TestNonStandardNormalValues runs 1.5s,
the change reduces it to 0.2s in short mode.
The problem is with slow machines, emulators and dynamic tools.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=684a2f9b0b7f ***

math/rand: decrease test duration in short mode
TestNonStandardNormalValues runs 1.5s,
the change reduces it to 0.2s in short mode.
The problem is with slow machines, emulators and dynamic tools.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5540065

subject: code review 5540065: math/rand: decrease test duration in short mode
